Title: They Serve Horses, Don't They?
Writer: Steven Davis, Kelvin Yu, Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: The Belchers find themselves involved in a full-blown investigation when Bob secures a new meat provider who claims to save money on every order.
